rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0001
rows.name:
There is certain drink Pilopilo
always want to try...

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0002
rows.name:
If friend is salvager, has probably
drank it before.

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Is delicious-looking concoction that
enemy drop when defeated or toppled.

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Apparently one sip enough to fill
drinker with energy right away!

rows.label: tlk42350212_01_msg0006
rows.name:
But Pilopilo not good at fighting,
so never got to try one...
